content: no kings no kings hat 2 yarn notes sport weight yarn in the following to avoid jogs uneven stripes at the beginning of quantities rounds i use this jogless join method 130 m/142 yards in main colour to avoid long floats over the sword length i used the 60 m/65 yards in contrast colour ladderback jacquard technique the sample hat was knitted in cheviot because chart 1 is so wide it has been split into 3 yarn from the hebridean woolshed main parts when you get to these charts start with round 1 colour white and rauma finullgarn of chart 1a followed by round 1 of chart 1b and then contrast colour black both yarns have round 1 of chart 1c continue as established until you 175m per 50g have completed round 32 of all charts needles instructions 2 5 mm / us 1 5 circular needle 50 cm with cc and smaller needles cast on 136 sts place 3 mm / us 2 5 circular needle 50 cm marker and join in a round work k2p2 rib until work 3 mm / us 2 5 double-pointed needles measures 3cm/1 25 k 1 round plain increasing 3 sts evenly spaced = 139 sts gauge change to larger needles work chart 1 on final round place marker every 20 sts if desired note that the final 15 sts x 16 row = 5 cm/2 over chart 1 section will have only 19 sts work chart 2 around omitting the k2tog on final repeat blocked of round 2 this st is marked in yellow on the chart after round 2 there should be 18 sts in each section measurements height 22 cm/8 75 continue to work chart =14 sts after round 32 circumference 51cm/20 on the following round k2tog around = 7 sts the hat will fit a 56cm/22 head draw up rem sts abbreviations finishing cc contrast colour decrease decrease weave in ends block increase increase k knit add tassels or a pompom if desired k2tog knit 2 stitches together mc main colour p purl rem remaining repeat repeat round s rounds sl slip ssk slip slip knit st s stitch es instagram tynn_traad | ravelry group newnorwegian | newsletter jagged lines © lanja khon-engheim 2025 no kings hat 3
